flawed_nl_solution:
The colony had 1077 - 129 = <<1077-129=948>>948 penguins in it at the beginning of this year.
At the beginning of the second year, the colony had 948 / 3 = <<948/3=136>>136 penguins in it.
At the beginning of the first year, it had 136 / 2 = <<136/2=68>>68 penguins in it.
Thus, at the beginning of the first year, the penguin colony was catching 68 * 3/2 = 102 fish per day.
#### 102

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 316, not 136. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
